sentence.Network_en: She had put on her make-up and darkened her eyelashes.
sentence.Network_cn: 她已化好妆，并涂黑了睫毛。

sentence.Network_en: The fans sat enthralled in the darkened cinema.
sentence.Network_cn: 影迷们坐在黑漆漆的电影院里看得如痴如醉。

sentence.Network_en: As the day darkened the streetlights came on.

entry.tran: (建筑物或房间)黑暗的，漆黑的
entry.def: A darkened building or room has no lights on inside it.

example.tran: 他开车经过黑着灯的房子。

means.word_mean: 1. (of fabrics and paper) grown dark in color over time;
2. become or made dark by lack of light;

auth_sentence.content: Day darkened over the Channel, the skyline vanished.
